channel.title: spring-boot on The long way through Software Craftsmanship
channel.description: Recent content in spring-boot on The long way through Software Craftsmanship

item.title: Brown-bag session: Spring Boot
item.description: At a client, today we’ve done a brown-bag session on Spring Boot: we’ve gone through the basics with a sample maven project and its pom file. We’ve seen the Spring Initializr and a live demo, using curl for REST client.
